ClassInfo.description: Class contains all message ids and error codes that are used within the JEAF tests.
ClassInfo.author: JEAF Development Team

Message.name: VERIFICATION_FAILURE_TEST_MESSAGE_ID
Message.description: Message id is used to test class VerificationFailure

Message.name: VERIFICATION_FAILURE_TEST_ERROR_CODE
Message.description: Error code is used to test class VerificationFailure

Message.name: CHECK_CONSTRAINTS_WARNING_1
Message.description: Message id is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint warning.

Message.description: Message id is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint warning.

Message.description: Message id is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint warning.

Message.description: Message id is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint warning.

Message.name: CHECK_CONSTRAINTS_WARNING_9
Message.description: Message id is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint warning.

Message.name: CHECK_CONSTRAINTS_ERROR_1
Message.description: Error code is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint error.

Message.description: Error code is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint error.

Message.description: Error code is used to indicate an unfulfilled constraint error.

Message.name: TRACE_MESSAGE
Message.defaultText: Message that should be traced with level TRACE.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces with trace level TRACE.

Message.name: DEBUG_MESSAGE
Message.defaultText: Message that should be traced with level DEBUG.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces with trace level DEBUG.

Message.name: INFO_MESSAGE
Message.defaultText: Message that should be traced with level INFO.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces with trace level INFO.

Message.name: WARN_MESSAGE
Message.defaultText: Message that should be traced with level WARN.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces with trace level WARN.

Message.name: ERROR_MESSAGE
Message.defaultText: Message that should be traced with level ERROR.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces with trace level ERROR.

Message.name: FATAL_MESSAGE
Message.defaultText: Message that should be traced with level FATAL.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces with trace level FATAL.

Message.name: GENERIC_MESSAGE
Message.defaultText: Message that should be traced with level {0}.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces with a parameterized trace level.

Message.name: TX_NEVER_CALL_FROM_TX
Message.defaultText: Trying to call service with transaction behavior NEVER. This call must cause an exception thrown by the EJB container.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used within tests for traces when trying to call a service with transaction behvior NEVER from within a transaction.

Message.name: APE
Message.defaultText: Caused APE to test JEAFs interceptor implementation.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used to tests JEAFs interceptor implementation.

Message.name: SYE
Message.defaultText: Caused SYE to test JEAFs interceptor implementation.
Message.description: Message-Id will be used to tests JEAFs interceptor implementation.
